statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM CustomerInformation WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT phone_number, name FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM CustomerInformation WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM CustomerInformation WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM CustomerInformation WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id IN (3, 5, 7);
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT amount, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM TransactionHistory WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM CustomerInformation ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM TransactionHistory WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TransactionHistory WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM CustomerInformation WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM TransactionHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM TransactionHistory WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (3, 5, 7);
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spend FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name;
SELECT c.customer_name, f.fraud_type, f.fraud_description FROM customers c INNER JOIN fraud_history f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, t.transaction_amount, t.transaction_date FROM customers c LEFT JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '+1%';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_flags WHERE flag_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;

SELECT customer_name, flag_description, flag_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id JOIN fraud_flags ON transactions.transaction_id = fraud_flags.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies ORDER BY currency_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, balance FROM account_balance WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, balance FROM customers LEFT JOIN account_balance ON customers.customer_id = account_balance.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_transactions > 5000 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;

SELECT customers.first_name, transactions.transaction_amount, transaction_history.transaction_date FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id INNER JOIN transaction_history ON transactions.transaction_id = transaction_history.transaction_id ORDER BY transaction_history.transaction_date DESC;
